data.value: A cumulative histogram is a mapping that counts the cumulative number of observations in all of the bins up to the specified bin.
The number of bins to use for the histogram. Default is 10.
The lower and upper values for the range of the histogram. If no value is given, a range slightly larger than the range of the values in
The weights for each value in
. Default is None, which gives each value a weight of 1.0
Return a cumulative frequency histogram, using the histogram function.
